name: ChristmasLocker
0:
”Alexa Open Christmas Locker”
”Ask Christmas Locker”
”Alexa, start christmas locker”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: christmas locker
des:
Parents can play Santa to leave messages for kids. 
Kids can listen to messages left by Santa(parents). 
If your kids are too smart, they might figure out the way to play Santa. 
You can be creative to use this to say things you don't want to say directly to someone. 
I want to use this to have some experience of custom skill development and to have real user feedback.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
